title: Get to know the higher education system | Study in Germany

By clicking the "Accept all" button, you consent to this processing. You can also find selection options and explanations of these cookies and processing at the end of this page under "Cookies". text_sections.section_11: Get to know the higher education system
text_sections.section_12: Find out more about Germany’s higher education system, the different types of institutions and qualifications.
text_sections.section_19: Here you can find information about the various subject groups on offer at German higher education institutions and the career opportunities open to you after completing your studies.
text_sections.section_21: All higher education insitutions in Germany have international offices or – „Akademische Auslandsämter“. They advise and support international students and are often your first point of contact on campus. They also organise events and put you in touch with other international students.
text_sections.section_22: On this website you will find  (https://www.hochschulkompass.de/hochschulen/hochschulsuche/search/1.html?tx_szhrksearch_pi1%5Bsltyp%5D%5B1%5D=1&tx_szhrksearch_pi1%5Bresults_at_a_time%5D=25) .

meta_tags.title: Get to know the higher education system
meta_tags.description: In Germany, you can choose between different state and private higher education institutions. Find out more about Germany’s higher education system.
